home.name: Nobuhiro Harada
home.introduction: I'm a web application developer based in Tokyo, and I'm very passionate and dedicated to my work.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: My introduction
about.description: Frontend & Backend developer, I create or maintenance web applications, I have years of experience and many clients are happy with the projects carried out.

web_app_development.title:
Web application
development
web_app_development.description: I have developed more than 10 web applications, including my own products.
web_app_development.item_1: I can develop Web application from scratch.
web_app_development.item_2: I can develop web applications using Laravel, CakePHP, React, Vue.
web_app_development.item_4: I can develop using Docker, MAMP, VirtualBox, Vagrant.
web_app_development.item_5: I can develop using Mac, Windows.
web_app_development.item_6: I can proceed with the project while consulting with team members about the progress of work and the details of tasks.

web_app_mentenance.title:
Web application
maintenance
web_app_mentenance.description: I have been in charge of operation and maintenance of web applications operated by more than 5 companies.
web_app_mentenance.item_1: If I don't have documentation or specs, I can figure out the specs from the program.
web_app_mentenance.item_3: I can operate and maintain using Docker, MAMP, VirtualBox, Vagrant.
web_app_mentenance.item_4: I can operate and maintain using Mac and Windows.
web_app_mentenance.item_5: I can proceed with the project while consulting with team members about the progress of work and the details of tasks.

api_development_mentenance.title: API development, maintenance
api_development_mentenance.description: I have been in charge of development, operation and maintenance of APIs operated by more than 5 companies.
api_development_mentenance.item_1: I can develop API from scratch.
api_development_mentenance.item_2: If I don't have documentation or specs, I can figure out the specs from the program.
api_development_mentenance.item_4: I can develop and maintain using Docker, MAMP, VirtualBox, Vagrant.
api_development_mentenance.item_5: I can develop and maintain using Mac and Windows.
api_development_mentenance.item_6: I can proceed with the project while consulting with team members about the progress of work and the details of tasks.
